name: Maini Materials
overview:
MMM designs offers equipment ranging from Material Handling Stackers, Loading Levelers, Electric Buggies, Storage Solutions, Forklift Trucks, Battery Operated Carts, Lifting Equipment, Floor Transportation Equipment and Towing Equipment for various applications across industries – Life style, Hospitality, Health care, Real estate, Travel and tourism, Service and Manufacturing, Government and Defence.

Our Infrastructure: Maini Materials Movement has state-of-the-art facility build up on 45,000 sqft. area with potential to build 70,000 sqft. more. The company has modern production facility and a full-fledged R & D division.

Quality: We are committed to a policy of total quality in all aspects of our operation. We manufacture our products to deliver performance excellence through defect prevention and continuous improvement programs to meet and exceed customer requirements. All employees are trained to understand the requirement of quality standards, regardless of their function as quality affects every aspect of the business.

Our Team: We are backed by a dedicated team, who regardless of their function or position have one goal (Complete Customer Delight).

Our Clients: We have garnered large satisfied base of clients from all over the world by providing them customized solutions. Moreover, we do not compromise on excellence and ensure to supply high quality products.

Why Us?: Customized solutions Excellent after sales support with PAN India reach Large dealer network Branch offices at major cities Eco-friendly products
